title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zoom’s Journey from Conversation to Completion with AI Companion 3.0 (ISV321)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zoom 借助 AI Companion 3.0 从对话到完成的旅程 (ISV321)
abstract: Learn how Zoom shifted from AI that just reports on meetings to AI that helps you prepare for them. With AI Companion 3.0, a simple request like "Prepare me for my next meeting" starts an AI agent that automatically works across Calendar, Meetings, Chat, and Docs to gather what you need. This session shows how Zoom uses AWS services like Bedrock and OpenSearch to solve non-trivial challenges and change the way people work — moving beyond just finding information to taking action. See the real impact on how millions of users get ready for their day and work together
abstract_cn: 了解 Zoom 如何从仅报告会议的 AI 转变为帮助您准备会议的 AI。借助 AI Companion 3.0，一个简单的请求如"为我准备下一次会议"就能启动一个 AI 代理，自动跨 Calendar、Meetings、Chat 和 Docs 工作以收集您需要的内容。本次会议展示了 Zoom 如何使用 AWS 服务（如 Bedrock 和 OpenSearch）来解决重大挑战并改变人们的工作方式——从仅仅查找信息转向采取行动。了解这对数百万用户如何准备一天的工作和协作产生的实际影响
